CREATE TABLE `answers` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `question_option_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `answer_numeric` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, `answer_text` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `answer_yn` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `answer_data` blob, `unit_of_measure_id` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`question_option_id`) REFERENCES `question_options` (`_id`), FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `questions` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `survey_section_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `input_type_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `question_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `question_subtext` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `is_answer_required` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `option_group_id` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, `is_allow_multiple_option_answers` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`survey_section_id`) REFERENCES `survey_sections` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`input_type_id`) REFERENCES `input_types` (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `question_options` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `question_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `option_choice_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`question_id`) REFERENCES `questions` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`option_choice_id`) REFERENCES `option_choices` (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `survey_comments` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `survey_header_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` varchar(4096) DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`survey_header_id`) REFERENCES `survey_headers` (`_id`), FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `survey_headers` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `organization_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `survey_name` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `instructions` varchar(4096) DEFAULT NULL, `otherHeaderInfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`organization_id`) REFERENCES `organizations` (`_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `survey_sections` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `survey_header_id` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, `section_name` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `section_title` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `section_subheading` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `is_section_required` tinyint(1) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE `user_survey_sections` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `survey_section_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `completed_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`_id`), FOREIGN KEY (`survey_section_id`) REFERENCES `survey_sections` (`_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `users` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `username` varchar(80) NOT NULL, `password_hashed` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `admin` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `invite_dt` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `last_login_dt` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `inviter_user_id` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL );
